DOC.brief_summary: This multicentre , randomize , double-blind , placebo control , parallel group exploratory study investigate efficacy , safety tolerability AD 337 treatment fibromyalgia female subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicentre Trial Determine Efficacy Safety AD-337 Treatment Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: Female Age 1865 Meet ACR 1990 criterion classification Fibromyalgia Able willing discontinue CNS active therapy If pain NOT primarily due Fibromyalgia Current prior history serious psychiatric disorder Pregnant/breastfeeding QTc > 470ms Failure respond 2 adequate regime different class antidepressant .
